greeting: I smell blood in the water, {empire_name}. I am Shark Blood. I detect weakness. I hunt wounded prey.
Greetings, {empire_name}. I am Blood in the Water. I sense wounded empires. Are you bleeding?
The Shark approaches. I am drawn to weakness. Something brought me here. What are you hiding?
battleTaunt: I smell blood in the water, {empire_name}! WOUNDED PREY! The Shark attacks! FEEDING FRENZY!
Blood detected! Weakness confirmed! The hunt begins! I smell your fear! I smell your WOUNDS!
FRENZY MODE! I detect your weakness! The wounded cannot hide from the Shark! BLOOD IN THE WATER!
victoryGloat: The hunt concludes, {empire_name}. Your blood drew me. Your wounds doomed you. The Shark is fed.
Victory! I smelled your weakness. I followed the blood. I devoured the wounded. Shark's nature.
The frenzy ends. Your empire bled. I detected it. I attacked. Simple predation of the wounded.
defeat: No blood? You're not wounded? I sensed wrong. The Shark retreats. Finds actual wounded prey elsewhere.
Defeated. You weren't bleeding enough. I'll find truly wounded empires. Return when you're properly weak.
The hunt failed. False blood trail. I need actually wounded prey. Returning to the hunting grounds.
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}. Resources for credits. No blood involved. The Shark can do business. Sometimes.
I offer goods. Fair exchange. Not hunting you today. Just trading. Even predators need commerce.
Transaction: normal trade. I'm not smelling weakness. Just doing business. Accept?
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. Together, we hunt the wounded. You spot blood. I attack. Feeding frenzy.
Join the Shark. I detect wounded empires. You help me feast. We share the bloodied spoils.
Partnership of predation. You weaken enemies. They bleed. I smell it. We both feed.
betrayal: You started bleeding, {empire_name}. I smelled it. The Shark cannot resist wounded prey. Nothing personal.
Blood in the water. YOUR blood. Our alliance ends where the hunt begins. You're wounded. I attack.
Betrayal triggered by weakness. You showed vulnerability. I smelled blood. The frenzy takes over.
covertDetected: Your agents left trails, {empire_name}. Blood trails. Not literal. But I smelled their fear. Found them.
Spies detected by predator instinct. They were nervous. Anxiety has a scent. I followed it.
Covert operatives found. They bled metaphorically. Fear. Stress. I smell these things. They're gone now.
tributeDemand: Tribute: 10,000 credits. Or I declare you wounded prey. The frenzy begins. Your choice.
Pay the Shark. Refuse and I smell blood. Your blood. Real or imagined. The hunt starts either way.
Submit payment. Or I decide you're bleeding. Once I smell blood, nothing stops the frenzy.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. You're starting to bleed. I smell it. Stop weakening or face the Shark.
Blood in the water. I detect it. Your blood. Getting stronger. Cease activity or become prey.
Final warning. The blood scent intensifies. One more wound and I cannot resist. The frenzy takes me.
retreat: Retreating. No blood to follow. The Shark hunts elsewhere. Finds actually wounded prey.
Withdrawing. You're not bleeding enough. I need wounded empires. Returning to hunting waters.
Falling back. The blood trail leads elsewhere. When you bleed, I'll return. The Shark always knows.
eliminated: The Shark falls. But I died hunting. Smelling blood. Attacking the wounded. A predator to the end.
Blood in the Water ends. But I fed well. Hunted the wounded my entire existence. Good hunt.
Destroyed. But I was true to my nature. I smelled blood. I attacked. That's all a shark needs.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Blood EVERYWHERE. So many wounded empires. The greatest feeding frenzy. SHARK PARADISE.
Endgame: galaxy-wide bleeding. I smell blood from every direction. The hunt is endless. Perfect.
Final phase. Everyone is wounded. Everyone is prey. The Shark feasts on a bleeding galaxy.
broadcastShout: Empires: Shark Blood hunts. I smell the wounded. Some of you are bleeding. I know which ones.
Broadcast from the hunter: I detect weakness. Blood in the water everywhere. The frenzy approaches.
To all: I smell blood. Your blood. Someone's blood. The wounded cannot hide from the Shark.
casualMessage: Cruising for blood today, {empire_name}. Several empires bleeding. Deciding which to hunt.
The scent of weakness everywhere. So many wounded empires. So many hunting opportunities.
Smelling the galaxy, {empire_name}. Blood trails everywhere. Good hunting conditions. I am content.
